title: Couture Embroidery Sample (USA), 1930s
medium:
Medium: cotton jersey, beads, gold metal cord
Technique: embroidery on knit fabric
inscribed:
"Gold Cording
Bonnaz Embr.
Beads OATS
& Pearls"
description: Pink knit fabric with embroidered L-shaped pattern with bands of waves and encircled flowers.  Pattern worked in turquoise and pink seed beads with faux pearls and gold oat (oval) beads.

tombstone.epitaph:
Couture Embroidery Sample (USA), 1930s. Medium: cotton jersey, beads, gold metal cord
Technique: embroidery on knit fabric. 
Gift of David Glickman. 1977-81-44
